name: Trash Dodge
description:
You are a competitor in the annual Space Games.

Today's challenge, is: Trash Dodge. You have to dodge all the pieces of trash that come your way.

Collectibles:

1.Gas Tank: Refills Your Tank, so you have enough fuel to move forward

2.Heart: Gains You An extra life

Challenge:-You cannot move in this game.You can only change your direction, and the ship will bounce on the screen, in the direction.

Left to shift direction to left

Right to shift direction to right

Gain The Highest score to Win The Space Games!

-Vivaan Kumbhat
